'''0.0.16a_02'''<ref>{{ytl|jUL9a2H_4sY|Minecraft - Lava Flood of Doooooom|FoxBlitzz|June 9, 2009}}</ref> is a version of [[Java Edition Classic]] released on June 7, 2009,<ref>{{link|url=https://forums.tigsource.com/index.php?topic=6273.msg211453#msg211453|title=Minecraft (alpha)|website=TIG Forums|author=[https://forums.tigsource.com/index.php?action=profile;u=1087 FishyBoy ]|date=June 8, 2009|quote=Played some multiplayer on C418's server. Great fun. Also: Gentlemen, behold!}}</ref> at 18:41 UTC, which released multiplayer and fixes bugs.<ref>[[#Testvan logs|Testvan's IRC logs]]: "''[12:41] <@Notch> do you get a nice "the server is full" message on the site now?''" (18:41 UTC)</ref>

0.0.16a_02 was reuploaded for the first time at 10:27 UTC on June 8, 2009, to do some testing.<ref>[[#Rotab logs|Rotab's IRC logs]]: "''(12:26:10) <@Notch> if anyone is available, I need some more mp testing done. =)''" [...] "''* Notch changes topic to: http://www.minecraft.net/ | mp test at http://www.minecraft.net/mptest.jsp''" (June 8, 2009, 10:26 UTC)</ref> This version had a bug with an unavailable input stream from minecraft.jar.<ref>[[#Rotab logs|Rotab's IRC logs]]: "''(12:27:52) <@pyl> inable to get input stream for minecraft.jar''" (June 8, 2009, 10:27 UTC)</ref>

0.0.16a_02 was soon reuploaded for the second time at 10:36 UTC to fix the unavailable input stream bug, but this fix was not successful.<ref>[[#Rotab logs|Rotab's IRC logs]]: "''(12:33:34) <KiT_> failed to connect. mp test over? [...] (12:33:58) <@Notch> hold, fixing a bug.. [...] server's up''" (June 8, 2009, 10:33 to 10:36 UTC)</ref>

0.0.16a_02 was reuploaded for the final time at 10:47 UTC<ref><samp>.jar</samp> file has a compilation time of 12:47 UTC+2.</ref> to fix a bug with an unavailable input stream from the <samp>[[minecraft.jar]]</samp> file.<ref>[[#Rotab logs|Rotab's IRC logs]]: "''(12:41:25) <@pyl> still unable to get input stream for minecraft.jar, giving up''" [...] "''(12:47:43) <@Notch> restarting server, I think I got the bug now''" (June 8, 2009, 10:41 to 10:47 UTC)</ref>

== Additions ==
=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Multiplayer]]'''<ref>[[wordofnotch:120086921|"Multiplayer: released!"]] – The Word of Notch, June 8, 2009</ref>

== Changes ==
=== General ===
* Fog underwater is now indigo instead of white.{{verify|may have been changed between 0.0.15a-mp1 and 0.0.16a_02}}

== Fixes ==
'''4 bugs fixed'''
* Fixed a connection problem.
* Partially fixed {{cmd|banip}}.
* Fixed flickering on the login screen.<ref>[[#Testvan logs|Testvan's IRC logs]]: "''[12:10] <Empty> Notch when I log in the "Today's message screen" flickers.''" [...] "''[12:11] <@Notch> i shall make fix''" (June 7, 2009, 18:10 UTC)</ref>
* Fixed being able to spawn [[mob]]s in multiplayer.<ref>[[#Testvan logs|Testvan's IRC logs]]: "''[12:12] <Empty> I wonder can other people see the mobs I spawn''" [...] "''[12:14] <IDTL> Spawning mobs should probably be disabled on multiplayer''" (June 7, 2009, 18:12 UTC)</ref>

== Bugs ==
'''2 bugs reported'''
* Unavailable input stream from minecraft.jar.<ref>[[#Rotab logs|Rotab's IRC logs]]: "''(12:41:25) <@pyl> still unable to get input stream for minecraft.jar, giving up''" (June 8, 2009, 10:41 UTC)</ref>
** This bug was fixed by reupload 3.
* It was reported that a player swimming diagonally towards a corner where the right side is higher than the left side wouldn't be able to get onto the land until they look away from the block.<ref>[[#0614 logs|June 14 IRC logs]]: "''A4:08:14 <vdgmprgrmr> If you're in water, and you're in a situation like this:''" [...] "''A4:09:26 <vdgmprgrmr> And you're in the liquid, and you try to move diagonally toward the center while pressing space, you can't get on the block like you should be able to.''" [...] "''A4:10:01 <vdgmprgrmr> You have to be almost looking at the center of the block that would be to the left of the 1-height-block to get on it.''" (9:08 to 9:10 UTC)</ref>
